descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Dive into HexWind, an immersive VR magic-action roguelike from the veteran indie studio behind FORM and Twilight Path! Crafted from the ground up as a combat-focused VR experience, HexWind lets players harness the elements and wield powerful spells as they fight within the dynamic HexTime system.
[media]
Each run is a new adventure, with procedurally generated environments, formidable enemies, and hidden powers waiting to be uncovered.

The fusion of magic and action creates a dynamic combat system that keeps you on your toes, ensuring no two encounters are ever the same.

**Join Us in Early Access and Shape the Journey!**
[media]
Become a part of the HexWind story from the very beginning. As an Early Access participant, you’ll receive **regular updates** packed with new content, features, and enhancements. Our **full roadmap** lays out our ambitious plan to expand the game’s world, abilities, and challenges—all influenced by feedback from players like you.
- **Regular Content Drops:** New spells, enemies, collectibles and dungeons to keep the adventure fresh.
- **Community-Driven Development:** Your feedback directly impacts game improvements and additions.
- **Exclusive Insider Access:** Get sneak peeks at upcoming features and participate in special events.
Are you ready to step into a VR combat challenge like no other?
